product_name: The North Face Base Camp Lite Sneakers - Men's
long_description: The Base Camp Lite Sneakers from The North Face combine soft, flexible uppers with moisture-wicking linings for post-hike or around-town comfort. Cotton canvas uppers offer flexible, breathable coverage; Trek-Dry(R) mesh linings wick moisture away from skin for comfort in warm weather. EVA footbeds and outsoles provide lightweight cushioning and support for casual activities. The North Face Base Camp Lite Sneakers feature daisy-chain-style heel loops so you can clip the shoes to the outside of your backpack with a carabiner.
short_description: The Base Camp Lite Sneakers from The North Face combine soft, flexible uppers with moisture-wicking linings for post-hike or around-town comfort.
